Package lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasListeners
    The Interface HasListeners, used when a controller has listeners that it should destroy when the client window is being closed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractController
    This class consists of an abstract controller for checking any Dt information passed to other controllers fulfils the Is() method of the Dt class.
    AbstractUserController
    The Class AbstractUserController, used for generic functions that are done by both administrators and coordinators.
    AdminController
    The Class AdminController, used to do functions that an admin can only do.
    AlertController
    The alert controller deals with any functions to do with alerts.
    ComCompanyController
    The ComCompany controller deals with any functions to do with communication companies.
    CoordinatorController
    The Class CoordinatorController.
    CrisisController
    The crisis controller deals with any functions to do with crises.
    HumanController
    The Human controller deals with any functions to do with humans in the system.
    SystemStateController
    The Class SystemStateController which controls setting up the initial environment on the server, updating the system time and running crisis handling functions.
